mapper.select:
select s.*,rownum from (select dep_name,avg(total_grade) as "avg" from score_stat_view where state in (1,2,3,4) group by dep_name order by avg(total_grade) desc)s
where rownum<=5

select b.*,rownum from (SELECT bd_name, count(*) as "COUNT" FROM board_stat_view WHERE reg_date between trunc(sysdate) - 30 and trunc(sysdate) group by bd_name order by count(*) desc)b
where rownum<=5
